mapper.select: select mynong_name, name, cnt membercnt, original, mynong_date from (select rownum rnum, om.* from (select member.*, cnt, nong.mynong_date from member inner join (select m.mynong_name, count(*) cnt, n.mynong_date from member m, mynong n where m.mynong_name = n.mynong_name group by m.mynong_name, n.mynong_date) nong on member.mynong_name = nong.mynong_name where member.my_farm = '1' order by nong.mynong_date) om ) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}

select mynong_name, name, cnt membercnt, original, mynong_date from (select rownum rnum, om.* from (select member.*, cnt, nong.mynong_date from member inner join (select m.mynong_name, count(*) cnt, n.mynong_date from member m, mynong n where m.mynong_name = n.mynong_name group by m.mynong_name, n.mynong_date) nong on member.mynong_name = nong.mynong_name where member.my_farm = '1' ) om ) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
